item.title: We read “The Importance of Being Earnest” (Oscar Wilde)
item.description: On Friday, Octorber 23rd, we will read “The Importance of Being Earnest” from Oscar Wilde at my place. It will be in English and we will split up roles. If you want to join, please contact me.
